articles.title: Compute Engine Predictive Autoscaling
articles.description: A new predictive autoscaling capability lets you add additional Compute Engine VMs in anticipation of forecasted demand.
articles.content: How does it work?Predictive autoscaling uses your instance group&#8217;s CPU history to forecast future load and calculate how many VMs are needed to meet your target CPU utilization. Our machine… [+4507 chars]
